member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.AdvancedFilters.AdvancedFilters.GetRadius(ImageResizer.Resizing.ImageState,System.String,System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates a radius based on the provided value, using min(width/height) as the normalizing factor. Querystring values are interpreted as 1/1000ths of the normalizing factor.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.AdvancedFilters.AdvancedFilters.AdjustContrastBrightnessSaturation(AForge.Imaging.Filters.HSLLinear,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.param: -1..1 float to adjust luminance (brightness). 0 does nothing
-1..1 float to adjust saturation. 0 does nothing
If false, adjusting brightness and luminance will adjust contrast also. True causes white/black washout instead.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.AdvancedFilters.HistogramThresholdAlgorithm.Simple
member.summary: Simple upper and lower usage thresholds are applied to the values in each channel's histogram to determine the input start/stop points for each individual channel. The start/stop points are used to calcualte the scale factor and offset for the channel.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.AdvancedFilters.HistogramThresholdAlgorithm.Area
member.summary: Threshold is applied based on cumulative area at the lower and upper ends of the histogram. Much larger thresholds are required for this than SimpleThreshold.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.AdvancedFilters.HistogramThresholdAlgorithm.GIMP
member.summary: Threshold is applied based on strangely skewed cumulative area, identical to the process used by GIMP

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.AdvancedFilters.AutoWhiteBalance.GIMPThreshold(System.Int32[],System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Matches the GIMP white balance algorithm, if provided 0.006 and 0.006 for the thresholds

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.AdvancedFilters.AutoWhiteBalance.Algorithm
member.summary: The algorithm to use when determining the histogram sections to discard

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.AdvancedFilters.AutoWhiteBalance.LowThreshold
member.summary: The usage threshold to use for lower channel values. Normally around 0.006 for area algorithms, or 0.0006 for iterative algorithms.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.AdvancedFilters.AutoWhiteBalance.HighThreshold
member.summary: The usage threshold to use for higher channel values. Normally around 0.006 for area algorithms, or 0.0006 for iterative algorithms.
